title: Looking for an Electric Pickup Truck? More Options Are on the Way
sub_head: GM teases electric version of its GMC Sierra; Toyota reveals plans for future electric truck
body:
The U.S. auto industryâ€™s truck wars are going electric.
More major auto makers are unveiling plans to roll out electric-pickup models, a reminder of the competition coming at newer rivals like Tesla Inc. and Rivian Automotive Inc.
